CustomField.description: Specifies whether the metric captures information at the organization, product/service level or both. IRIS metrics can be used to differentiate between data points that apply to specific products/services offered by the organization and data points that apply to the organization as a whole. In instances where a metric can be used to describe either a product or the organization, organizations are encouraged to indicate the level at which they are reporting information.
CustomField.label: Metric Level
